com.markussecundus.formsgdx.input.interfaces

Interface ListeneredUniversalConsumer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InputConsumer, ListeneredKeyConsumer, ListeneredScrollConsumer, ListeneredTouchConsumer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IListeneredUniversalConsumer, IListeneredUniversalConsumer.ForLayout
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InputManager, InputManager.AsInputProcessor, Slider, Slider.Basic

    public interface ListeneredUniversalConsumer
extends ListeneredScrollConsumer, ListeneredTouchConsumer, ListeneredKeyConsumer
    Rozhraní pro InputConsumer, jenž má pro zpracovávání všech vstupních událostí dedikované EventDelegates. Pro kanonickou implementaci viz IListeneredUniversalConsumer.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    IListeneredUniversalConsumer, ListeneredKeyConsumer, ListeneredTouchConsumer, ListeneredScrollConsumer

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.markussecundus.formsgdx.input.InputConsumer

      • Methods inherited from interface com.markussecundus.formsgdx.input.interfaces.ListeneredKeyConsumer
